subject: Basketball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Sports Medicine
lead_paragraph: The top pick in the 2009 N.B.A. draft has not played in the regular season after sustaining a stress fracture in his left kneecap in the team’s final preseason game.
snippet: The top pick in the 2009 N.B.A. draft has not played in the regular season after sustaining a stress fracture in his left kneecap in the team’s final preseason game.
